description: Verify that the Privacy Policy page loads correctly when accessing the /privacy-policy URL
scenario: User navigates to the Privacy Policy page to read about data protection and privacy rights
expected_results: Display the complete Privacy Policy page with header, content sections, and proper RA 10173 compliance information
procedure:
1. Open web browser
2. Navigate to http://localhost:5000/privacy-policy
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check page title displays 'Privacy Policy'
5. Verify all policy sections are visible and properly formatted

description: Verify the Privacy Policy page is responsive across different screen sizes
scenario: User views privacy policy on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices
expected_results: Page content adapts properly to different screen sizes while maintaining readability
procedure:
1. Navigate to /privacy-policy page on desktop (1920x1080)
2. Verify all sections display in proper layout
3. Resize browser to tablet size (768px width)
4. Check grid layouts adjust appropriately
5. Resize to mobile size (375px width)
6. Verify cards stack vertically on mobile
7. Check all text remains readable on small screens
8. Test scrolling behavior on mobile
9. Verify touch interactions work properly

description: Verify privacy policy page loads efficiently despite substantial content
scenario: User accesses privacy policy and expects reasonable loading times
expected_results: Page loads within acceptable time limits with all content and styling
procedure:
1. Clear browser cache
2. Open browser developer tools Performance tab
3. Navigate to /privacy-policy page
4. Record page load time
5. Verify total load time is under 3 seconds
6. Check First Contentful Paint (FCP) metrics
7. Verify Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) is acceptable
8. Test page load on slower network connections
9. Check for any render-blocking resources
10. Verify content loads progressively

description: Verify all sections required by Republic Act 10173 (Data Privacy Act) are present
scenario: User reads privacy policy to understand their rights under Philippine data protection law
expected_results: Display all required sections including data controller info, legal basis, data subject rights, and security measures
procedure:
1. Navigate to /privacy-policy page
2. Verify 'Introduction and Legal Framework' section mentions RA 10173
3. Check 'Data Controller Information' section is present
4. Verify 'Definitions (Per RA 10173)' section exists
5. Check 'Legal Basis for Processing (Section 12)' is displayed
6. Verify 'Data Privacy Principles (Section 11)' section
7. Check 'Your Rights as a Data Subject (Section 16)' section
8. Verify 'Security of Personal Information (Section 20)' section
9. Check 'National Privacy Commission' contact information

description: Verify all required privacy policy content sections are present and complete
scenario: Legal review to ensure privacy policy meets regulatory requirements
expected_results: All 14 main sections are present with appropriate subsections and legal references
procedure:
1. Navigate to /privacy-policy page
2. Verify 'Introduction and Legal Framework' section
3. Check 'Data Controller Information' section
4. Verify 'Definitions' section with three definitions
5. Check 'Personal Information We Collect' with subsections
6. Verify 'Legal Basis for Processing' section
7. Check 'Data Privacy Principles' section
8. Verify 'Your Rights as a Data Subject' with six rights
9. Check 'Security of Personal Information' section
10. Verify remaining sections through 'Contact Us'
11. Check all legal references to RA 10173 sections
12. Verify contact information completeness
